00009 StringList readDirectory(string path) {
00010         struct dirent *ep;
00011         DIR* dp = opendir(path.c_str());
00012         StringList r;
00013         if(dp != NULL) {
00014                 while(ep = readdir(dp)) {
00015                         if(ep->d_name[0] == '.') continue;
00016                         r.push(ep->d_name);
00017                 }
00018                 closedir(dp);
00019         }
00020         return r;
00021 }
